item.description:
Vegan Metro West meetup ( http://www.meetup.com/vegan-516 ) is heading up to Maple Farm Sanctuary ( http://www.maplefarmsanctuary.org/ ) to celebrate Farm Fest and they've invited us along for the ride.

 

Come and enjoy live music, food and more.

 

Meet members of another veg group and enjoy the fresh air, all within easy driving distance of Providence.

 

More details at: http://www.maplefarmsanctuary.org/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy with really short hair, or try my cell: 401-699-7304

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Farm Fest at Maple Farm Sanctuary (joint meetup with Vegan Metro West Network)
